column3: Pshkohhh... Uplander has questions? Cheepchix has answers!
What kind of place is this?
Scavenge, learn, build! The technology of Sharlayan is ours for taking!
Gobbieflock learns much and more every day from junk and tomes. Fill braincases with uplander words and wisdom!
But Illuminati wants words and wisdom all for themselves. Cheepchix cannot abide that! Cheepchix likes having embiggened vocabulary!
Gobbieflock wanders for many years, in accordance with gobbie tradition. But then, by great fortune, gobbieflock comes to abandoned city of Sharlayan!
Much wisdom to be had in study of junk and reading of tomes. The decision is made: gobbieflock must stay!
Later come like-minded uplanders to share in spoils. Together we build Idyllshire─community of hardworking, industrious individuals!
